docs.text: Hello Docker Welcome to the documentation for the Hello Docker project. This project is a simple example of how to use Docker to containerize a Node.js application. Getting Started To get started with the project, you'll need to have Docker installed on your machine. You can download Docker here . Once you have Docker installed, you can clone the repository and build the Docker image: git clone https://github.com/SJ-Kumar/hellodocker.git cd hellodocker docker build -t hellodocker .
docs.title: Hello Docker
